## appicon

Return Data URI icon from app stores (ios, android)

### install
```
npm i --save appicon
```
or as global:
```
npm i -g appicon
```

### usage
```js
const appicon = require('appicon')
appicon('twitter', 'ios', (uri) => {
  console.log(url)
})
```

### cli usage
```
appicon twitter ios
```

result:

```
data:image/jpeg;base64,
```
